description:
The Oda Clan’s next target is Ise. Oda regroups with Takigawa Kazumasu, who is the liege of one of his territories in order to win against the father and son duo of Kitabatake Tomonori and Tomofusa, who rule over South Ise. However, Kazumasu hates shinobi, and apparently there is an oni in the Kitabatake army...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Certain Shinobi-Hater and a Super Great Swordsman
Toaru Shinobi Kirai no to Chou Kengou
Un anti-ninja et le grand maître épéiste
とある忍び嫌いと超剣豪
